data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
CM Synergy is a change and configuration management system from
    Telelogic AB (www.telelogic.com). Though it is arguably more
    powerfull than PVCS Version Manager :) I think that it belongs under
    VCS::. OTOH, one of its main competitors - ClearCase - got away with
    a toplevel namespace.
